mixed-citation.article-title: Morphology and Taxonomy of Isopoda Anthuroidea (Crustacea) from Sulawesi with description of six new species

tp:treatment-sec.p: Colanthura tenuis Richardson, 1902 . Ten species are currently accepted in this genus. Most have been found in shallow habitats of the Indo-Pacific; however, C. uncinata Kensley, 1978 has been found at a depth of 775 m off South Africa ( Kensley 1978 b).
